title: Import: Projekter, test af import
description:
Hi 

I need a test called "Projekter - RM2 to SimplyCRM"

It should compare the following columns from RM2 

http://prntscr.com/i7kui7

- Identifikator
- Navn
- Projektleder 
- Projektstatus

And the number 857 (total number of projects)

With the following in SimplyCRM

http://prntscr.com/i7kxfz
They hold close to the same name, so you can see the columns to use. 

You need to find the right identifikator, and only test the 1st, number 10 and number 20 on the page.
Finding the identifikator in Simply means inserting the number as you can see, and press "Søg" and then
I suggest you insert both identifikator, and the name for example, then it will come up on same place always I believe.



It has to tell me what doesnt match. What it errors on.

title: Make a test-script that will compare number of contacts
description:
We're importing old data from the clients current/old system (called RM2), and need to verify if we have the exact same number of contacts, organisations, etc., in the new system as in their current/old system.

Therefore, please make a test-script that will compare number of "RM2 users" to "Simply Contacts", and "RM2 Companies" to "Simply organisations". Ie. take the number from RM2 and verify if its the same in Simply.

So select status here in RM2:

![image](/uploads/9199b7cfe8ae40ad93692ea62ab35c59/image.png)

and then check the value at the bottom of the screen here:

![image](/uploads/a712f22d842f17c256b8784dee18b3a6/image.png)

And compare that to corresponding value in Simply:

![image](/uploads/36355efdb95e36f9650de6c537370fe6/image.png)

Simply is now located at http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/ - and RM2 is located at Projekt.danva.dk.

Projekt.danva.dk - login: rm2test password: rm2test

Please ask here if you have any questions.

description:

and choose that project.

- After that you select "Gem"

- Now you click "Budget

enter "Vandhuset" and do the search.

It should now show the budget.

title: Adminstration of membership fee
description:
Correct administration of membership fee, old orders stays the same.

Ie. currently we have a list of the base fees for subscription here: http://danva.dev.simplyhq.com/index.php?module=Memberships&view=List

Each calculation is hardcoded in 3 functions:

1.  **Making personal subscription Salesorder** - ie. GENERATE_SALES_ORDERS under contacts (https://screencast.com/t/SC4Cw1eUXMOG)
1.  **Making company subscription Salesorder** - ie. GENERATE_SUBSCRIPTION_SALES_ORDERS under Comapnies (https://screencast.com/t/PDTaCMZoV4)
1.  **Making company funds contribution Salesorder** - ie. FUNDS_CONTRIBUTION_SO (https://screencast.com/t/aBvDQLXt46b)

For full description of how these fees are calculated, please refer tohttps://docs.google.com/document/d/1JpD5h2aBSE0yxdWiBOOL-M6uF8IRsp0KTkG2KlvbHHo/edit#heading=h.d57xvcae0ef0

Notes:

* And Funds-contribution is only relevant if that is checked and will not be processed otherwise: https://screencast.com/t/5TRMFlBUGFm 

**The test workflow:**

We need to confirm that there are SalesOrders generated when you select the above 3 calculations, plus that these are correctly calculated. 
*  Personal membership should give same price a under membership-module
*  Company membership without voting-rights should give same price a under membership-module
*  Company membership with voting-rights should give same price a under membership-module, based on calculations from their water-amounts.
*  Ie. if you have test-company where funds-contribution is NOT relevat (see notes above), then it should give error-message instead of invoice.
*  If the funds-contribution is relevant, it should deliver the correct calculation

For correct calculations please check the above link to google-doc.

Please ask further questions if you need me to clarify!

title: Cancel membership
description:
1.	Log in with 
User: test.administration
Pass: pass4access
2.	Click "Medlemsskabslinjer"
3.	Take the 3rd line, and click on it
4.	Change the status to "Cancelled"
5.	Go back to overview, and check that the line with “Medlemsskabs ID”  has the status of cancelled

title: Create membership
description:
Correctly creation of membership and related things such as billing


https://www.screencast.com/t/XQz86rk99

En contact der får personlig medlemskab

- Log in as administrative user
- Click Brugere
- Click "Opret ny brugere"
- Insert "TestContact" in Fornavn, and "TestLast" in Efternavn
- Click GEM

- Click Medlemsskabslinjer
- Click Tilføj Medlemsskabslinje
---> Insert Personligt medlemsskab in "Medlemsskabs type"
---> Insert 01.09.2017 in Startdato
---> Insert 31.08.2017 in enddate
---> Set status to pending 
---> Click back to the client user, and check that it has a line in Medlemsskab.

- Check that a salesorder was created
--- Check that the price is 0
--- Check that it has the name "Personligt Medlemskab Magazine"

- In list view, mark the client that was created

- Choose Handling -> run the kontingent faktura
--- Check that the price is 937,50
--- Check that it has the name "2017 Subscription"

- Go into the client
- Now check the sales orders again, and check that a new one was created

-------- Delete the contact again
-------- Delete the salesorders

title: Fakturere ordrer - C5
description:
Korrekt dannelse og udsendelse af faktura fra ventende ordrer

(Need translation and steps)

title: Delete orders
description:
Correct deletion of orders

Steps:-
Product > chose product > sales order > chose and click an order > click "more" > click "delete order"

Here, please **add** an order first, and THEN delete it. So we're not deleting existing orders :)

title: Edit order
description:
Correct edit of orders including edits in the invoice and correct invoice informations

Steps:-
Product > choose product > sales order > chose and click an order > the bottom of the page "retantal/pris"

I've recorded a movie of this flow:
1. Select a specific product
1. Edit it
1. Edit title, plus address-fields, plus add 10000 to the invoice price at bottom
1. Save it
1. Verify that the new invoice in top (because its the most recently edited) now has "- edited" in title.

https://screencast.com/t/ItSZioqkwhnU

Remember, it is alway essential that you "assert" something at the end, so we know the change went well.

title: See incoming orders
description:
Correct and easy view of incoming orders
Steps:-
Product > choose product > sales order

**Remember:** We should **always** assert something on the page to fully verify that the script is working. 

Ie., please select the first order and verify that there is a "Total i alt" text last on the page: https://screencast.com/t/hcxMoSKkV

Does this make sense?

title: Testcase: Budget overview, single projects
description:
**Purpose:** Correct showing of details of single projects budget

1. Budget
1. Choose project
1. Budget post
1. Choose and click a budget
1. --> Should show a correct list of budget posts

The more clarified process is as follows:

1. Go to budget-module (budgetCollection)
1. Select project ("Vandhuset incl. Kantine")
1. Select budget year (2016)
1. Check that the "totals" under income Q4, that "totals" under expense Q4, and that the "Result totals Q4" match the same values as in the clients old System "RM2". Screenshot from the old system to verify values: https://screencast.com/t/PuK8lMyWWpIb - here we should explicitly assess that the numbers are there in the right place.

I've recorded the correct way to that budget + marked those 3 numbers with the cursor; please note that the way the numbers are shown (ie. "-185.743") is slightly different from the screenshot, but if the values are as they are in the screenshot (which they are) then its OK.

https://screencast.com/t/nrYULfKJ
